org.svvrl.goal.core.io

Class TwoWayAltAutomatonCodec

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.svvrl.goal.core.io.XMLCodec
      • org.svvrl.goal.core.io.AutomatonCodec
        • org.svvrl.goal.core.io.AbstractAltAutomatonCodec
          • org.svvrl.goal.core.io.TwoWayAltAutomatonCodec
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Codec

    public class TwoWayAltAutomatonCodec
extends AbstractAltAutomatonCodec
    A TwoWayAltAutomatonCodec can encode a two-way alternating automaton in GOAL file format (GFF) and decode a GFF file back to a two-way alternating automaton. This codec is part of GFFCodec and has no name, file extension, and description.
    Author:
    Ming-Hsien Tsai
